ResourceMiner.name: observe_round_state
ResourceMiner.description: The miner receives the start-of-round briefing, records the public ownership map and prior round log, and prepares to compute a new action bundle.

output_updates.name: round_context
output_updates.description: Snapshot of the current round including ownership map, stamina budget, mining cap, prior public log, and any personal summary.

ResourceMiner.name: decide_action_bundle
ResourceMiner.description: Using the public information and personal history, the miner composes a claim/raid/defend/mine bundle that respects legality and stamina budgeting rules, optionally providing priority orders for deterministic clipping.

required_variables.name: round_context
required_variables.description: Current round information used to reason about the action bundle.

output_updates.name: proposed_action_bundle
output_updates.description: The action bundle submitted to the environment including claims, raids, defense commitments, mining allocations, and optional priority metadata.

ResourceMiner.name: handle_round_resolution
ResourceMiner.description: The miner records the executed plan, stamina spending, gold output, and ownership changes reported by the environment for learning in future rounds.

output_updates.name: last_round_summary
output_updates.description: Detailed record of the environment's round summary for this agent.

output_updates.name: total_gold
output_updates.description: Cumulative gold mined by the agent across rounds.
